mapper.insert: INSERT INTO kb_procedure(id,title,description,author,board_id,type,status,sort_number) VALUES (#{procedure.id},#{procedure.title},#{procedure.description}, #{userName},#{boardId},#{procedure.type},#{procedure.status},(SELECT max_sort_number from (SELECT CASE WHEN max(sort_number) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE max(sort_number)+1 end as max_sort_number FROM kb_procedure WHERE board_id=#{boardId} ) as t ))
mapper.update: UPDATE kb_procedure SET title=#{procedure.title}, description=#{procedure.description}, sort_number=#{procedure.sortNumber}, status=#{procedure.status}, type=#{procedure.type} WHERE id=#{procedureId} AND delete_status=0
UPDATE kb_procedure SET sort_number = #{sortNumber} WHERE delete_status=0 AND id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM kb_procedure WHERE delete_status=0 AND board_id=#{boardId} AND kb_procedure.title=#{title}
SELECT * FROM kb_procedure WHERE delete_status=0 AND board_id=#{boardId} ORDER BY sort_number
SELECT * FROM kb_procedure WHERE delete_status=0 and id= #{procedureId}
mapper.delete: UPDATE kb_procedure SET delete_status=1 WHERE id=#{procedureId}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM kb_procedure WHERE delete_status=0 AND board_id=#{boardId} AND id!=#{procedureId} AND status=9 AND type =1
